text:
Achievers http://www.achievers.com | Developers & More | Toronto, Ontario, Canada | Full-time, ONSITE

My company has built a kick-ass employee recognition platform and we're looking for developers of all shapes and sizes.

Please don't apply if you're a jerk though, we don't hire assholes. He are some of our current requisitions:
